reviews.review: CS:GO but better only for og

i first played this game as a kid alot with my brother it was alot of fun then i wasnt allowed to play it for years because i didnt have a pc i was allowed to use to play it but now that i do and i have had a chance to play it again it brings back alot of nostalgia from when i was a kid and i played it with my brother

Its still one of the greatest games I have ever played!
I remember the good old times, when I was 16 and played it continiously :))
Still a good game to play on :D

This game will always take its place in my heart. The Source engine allows to produce so many modes that always find its fans. Personally I fell in love with Zombie Escape and Zombie Mod. I spent my childhood here and it was awesome. 

Today we have CS GO but I never was a fan of competitiveness without limits and ZE/ZM mods doesn't look as beautifull as they were in CSS but you can try if you want (CSGO is free at least).
